title: I dont even feel like im earning blue essense at all
body: Unlocked 3 boxes and I got {{champion:11}} {{champion:20}}  x2 {{champion:45}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:22}} and {{champion:115}} for a total of 2200 blue essanse. ziggs is worth 960

replies.body:
at least you didn't get a xin Zhao in a capsule, ally earns an s 2 games later for me to get a chest, to open it and get 2 more xin Zhao

did I forget to mention I already own him?

Same, I've grinded to level 41 already because i really want the Urf {{champion:19}} skin. But I'm still 20k away and i doubt i'll get it in time, even with the xp boosts. It honestly really bums me out considering it's the only {{champion:19}}  skin i need and i've been waiting 3 years for the chance to snag it.
opened champion capsule and only got {{champion:114}}
